| action2 = FAC | action2date = 03:55, 1 August 2014 | action2link = Wikipedia:Featured article candidates/2013 Rosario gas explosion/archive1 | action2result = promoted | action2oldid = 619223728
| currentstatus = FA | itndate = | dykdate = 15 October 2013 | dykentry = ... that some candidates in the [[Argentine legislative election, 2013|2013 Argentine legislative election]] ended their political campaigns after a '''[[2013 Rosario gas explosion|gas explosion]]''' in [[Rosario, Santa Fe|Rosario]]? |nompage=Template:Did you know nominations/Rosario gas explosion | topic = Engineering and technology | small = | four=no | maindate=06 August 2015 }} {{WikiProjectBannerShell|1= {{WikiProject Argentina|class=fa|importance=mid}} {{WikiProject Disaster management|class=fa|importance=low}} {{WikiProject Guild of Copy Editors |user=Stfg |date=9 June 2014 |old-user-1=Miniapolis|old-date-1=1 January 2014}} }} == Copyedit? ==
I started to review this for GAN, but it looks to me like this will need a good copyedit before it's ready. You might consider putting in a request at [[WP:GOCE|the Guild of Copyeditors]]; since this one isn't very long, someone will hopefully pick it up soon. Good luck, and thanks to everybody who worked on this one, [[User:Khazar2|Khazar2]] ([[User talk:Khazar2|talk]]) 17:26, 17 November 2013 (UTC)
:Done [[User:Cambalachero|Cambalachero]] ([[User talk:Cambalachero|talk]]) 00:51, 23 November 2013 (UTC)
{{Talk:2013 Rosario gas explosion/GA1}}
== Copy edit, June 2014 ==
''Investigation'': [[parole]] is for a convicted prisoner. More likely on bail, or simply pending trial. I think the source only says that Mi√±o was released, not on what conditions. Likewise for Garcia in the next paragraph. --[[User:Stfg|Stfg]] ([[User talk:Stfg|talk]]) 23:34, 9 June 2014 (UTC)
== TFAR notification ==
Please see [[Wikipedia:Today's featured article/requests/2013 Rosario gas explosion]]. — '''[[User:Cirt|Cirt]]''' ([[User talk:Cirt|talk]]) 01:07, 19 November 2014 (UTC)
